So after doing this filming today, that scenario that we put together, that our aim is to show teachers that cyberbuilding doesn't necessarily have to start online, it can start in the real world, and it can be as simply as just a little thing that you just saw someone bumping into each other someone looking at someone the wrong way these kinds of things and it's important to realize that that cyberbullying doesn't have to just be cyber bullying can be a combination of the two another thing we'd also like to point out for teachers is that if you don't know what to do and a student has approached you about this student subject, please get in touch with NET SAFE as soon as possible.
